p: Finally, our findings suggest that the implementation of hedgerows within the agricultural matrix, aiming at supporting pollination services, deserves particular attention in agricultural policies. These elements may offer early flower resources to social bees, boosting their presence in subsequent sunflower fields, but as a drawback, they may directly compete for light and soil nutrients with the crop at the field edge, affecting yield especially in small fields (as it is the case in the study area).
